title: Let's Gank Java - 4st
content:
Throw Exception.

public class ExceptionForNumber
{
    private static String output="";
    public static void main(String[] args){
        foo(1);//exceptionally
        System.out.println(output);
        output="";
        foo(0);//normal
        System.out.println(output);
    }

    public static void foo(int i){
        try{
            if(i==1){
                throw new Exception();
            }
            output+="1";
        }catch(Exception e){
            output+="2";
            return;
        }finally{
            output+="3";
        }
        output+="4";
    }
}

For instance, foo(0) result is "134" and foo(1) is "23".
